data.name: STORAGE_KANGA_INTRO
data.value: [emote=Happy]Hello, there!\nWelcome to [color=#98C379]Kangaskhan Storage.[color]

data.name: Box_Intro
data.value: [emote=Happy]Hiiii!~\u266A Welcome to [color=#98C379]Tinkaton's Box Busting.[color]\n[emote=Normal]Only {0} to open a box!\u266A

data.name: Box_Return
data.value: Need anything else?~\u266A

data.name: Box_Option_Open
data.value: Open Boxes

data.name: Box_Choose
data.value: Okay!~\u266A Pick a box you want me to open! Or, choose multiple with {0}.

data.name: Box_Bag_Empty
data.value: Awww... [pause=20] You've not got any items in your bag...

data.name: Box_Info_001
data.value: Hey! So, y'know those boxes you can find in dungeons?~\u266A

data.name: Box_Info_002
data.value: They're locked up tight![pause=20] There's nothing that can open them!

data.name: Box_Info_003
data.value: [emote=Inspired]Well...[pause=20] nothing except my hammer!

data.name: Box_Info_004
data.value: It'll cost you {0} for each box you want me to open.

data.name: Box_Goodbye
data.value: Okay~\u266A See you next time!

data.name: Box_No_Money
data.value: [emote=Worried]Umm...[pause=20] You don't have enough \uE024....

data.name: Box_Choose_One
data.value: Okay~\u266A I can open that {1} for {0}.

data.name: Box_Choose_Multi
data.value: Okay~\u266A I can open all that for {0}.

data.name: Box_Choose_Max
data.value: [emote=surprised]Wha- [pause=20][emote=normal]That's a lot, but I can do it for {0}.

data.name: Box_Start_Max
data.value: [emote=determined]Okay! Here goes![pause=20]\n[emote=angry]Rrraaahhhh!

data.name: Box_End_Max_001
data.value: [emote=sigh]Whew...[pause=30]\n[emote=normal]Okay, all done~\u266A

data.name: Box_End_Max_002
data.value: [emote=inspired]Okay~\u266A[pause=20] Here's your treasure!

data.name: Box_Start
data.value: Okay~\u266A Leave it to me!

data.name: Box_End
data.value: [emote=inspired]Okay~\u266A[pause=20] Here's your treasure!

data.name: Storage_Store
data.value: What do you want to store? You can choose more than one item using {0}.

data.name: STORAGE_KANGA_INTRO_2
data.value: Anything else, dear?

data.name: Storage_Goodbye
data.value: [emote=happy]Thank you, sweetie. Come again!

data.name: Storage_Unstore
data.value: What do you want to take? You can choose more than one item using {0}.

data.name: Shop_Bag_Empty
data.value: Oh?[pause=0] Nothing to sell?

data.name: Shop_Bag_Full
data.value: Oh![pause=0] You have no more space for items!

data.name: Shop_Buy
data.value: Very well![pause=0] Feel free to examine my merchandise! (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: Shop_Buy_Complete
data.value: Thank you! All yours~

data.name: Shop_Buy_Empty
data.value: I'm sold out.[pause=0] Please forgive me.[pause=0] I will have new merchandise tomorrow!

data.name: Shop_Buy_Multi
data.value: Altogether, that comes to {0}. Is that OK?

data.name: Shop_Buy_No_Money
data.value: What?[pause=0] You don't seem to have the money.

data.name: Shop_Buy_One
data.value: That {1}? That will be {0}.

data.name: Shop_Goodbye
data.value: Thanks! \u266A Please come again \u266A

data.name: Shop_Info_001
data.value: This shop specializes in selling items!

data.name: Shop_Info_002
data.value: Items are useful for your dungeon adventures!

data.name: Shop_Info_003
data.value: Use items with imagination! And invent new uses for them!

data.name: Shop_Info_004
data.value: If the shop sells out,[pause=0] we'll always have new things to sell on the next day!

data.name: Shop_Info_005
data.value: So spend time in dungeons until we restock! Visit us when you return~

data.name: Shop_Intro
data.value: Hello~\u266A \nWelcome to the Kecleon Shop~\u266A

data.name: Shop_Intro_Return
data.value: May I help you with anything else?

data.name: Shop_Option_Buy
data.value: Buy

data.name: Shop_Option_Sell
data.value: Sell

data.name: Shop_Sell
data.value: Very well! What will you sell? (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: Shop_Sell_Complete
data.value: Done deal! Thank you~\u266A

data.name: Shop_Sell_Multi
data.value: I can pay {0} for everything. Is that acceptable?

data.name: Shop_Sell_One
data.value: I can pay {0} for that {1}. Is that acceptable?

data.name: Bank_Menu_Bank2
data.value: Manage Funds

data.name: Bank_Info_001
data.value: You can store your hard-earned \uE024 here at [color=#98C379]Gholdengo Bank[color], clink~

data.name: Bank_Info_002
data.value: If you're defeated in a dungeon, you'll usually lose most of your money!

data.name: Bank_Info_003
data.value: We'll safeguard your \uE024 so you can adventure to your heart's content, without fear of losing anything.

data.name: Bank_Info_004
data.value: You can deposit or withdraw as much as you like.

data.name: Bank_Intro_001
data.value: Welcome to [color=#98C379]Gholdengo Bank[color], clink~\nHow can we be of service?

data.name: Bank_Intro_002
data.value: Anything else we can help with, clink~?

data.name: Bank_Goodbye
data.value: Thank you for your patronage. Please come again.

data.name: Bank_Manage
data.value: Certainly, here are your funds, clink~

data.name: Tutor_Intro
data.value: [emote=joyous]Welcome to [color=#98C379]Mienshao Moves.[color][pause=0][emote=normal] Are you here to relearn a move? The cost is just {0}.

data.name: Tutor_Intro_Return
data.value: Anything else, child?

data.name: Tutor_Option_Tutor
data.value: Tutor Move

data.name: Tutor_Goodbye
data.value: Very well. Return when you wish to relearn a move.

data.name: Tutor_No_Money
data.value: [emote=stunned]What is this? [pause=20]You have no money, child.

data.name: Tutor_Remember_Who
data.value: Who wishes to remember a move?

data.name: Tutor_Remember_What
data.value: I see...[pause=20] And which move shall {0} relearn?

data.name: Tutor_Remember_Replace
data.value: You will need to forget a move first.[pause=0] Which one, child?

data.name: Tutor_Remember_Begin
data.value: Very well. Let us begin.

data.name: Tutor_Remember_Success
data.value: It is done.[pause=0] {0} relearned {1}.

data.name: Tutor_Forget_Who
data.value: Who wishes to forget a move?

data.name: Tutor_Forget_What
data.value: I see...[pause=20] And which move shall {0} forget?

data.name: Tutor_Forget_Begin
data.value: Very well. Let us begin.

data.name: Tutor_Forget_Success
data.value: It is done.[pause=0]. {0} forgot {1}.

data.name: Tutor_Teach_Who
data.value: Who wishes to learn a move?

data.name: Tutor_Teach_What
data.value: I see...[pause=20] And which move shall {0} learn?

data.name: Tutor_Teach_Success
data.value: It is done.[pause=0] {0} has learned {1}.

data.name: Tutor_Info_001
data.value: If you wish to relearn a forgotten move, then I am capable of teaching them to you once again.

data.name: Tutor_Info_002
data.value: For a small fee, of course.[br]I can also help you forget a move, if that is what you wish.

data.name: Tea_Bag_Empty
data.value: Oi, you've got nothin' to brew with!

data.name: Tea_Goodbye
data.value: Alright, see you later.

data.name: Tea_Info_001
data.value: If you gimme food items from ya bag, I can brew up a a delish tea for you to enjoy![br]Food boosts ya EXP, berries and gummis boost stats, grimy food removes EXP, herbs remove stats.[br]There are no bonus chances so there's no benefit in saving your vitamins just for this shop.

data.name: Tea_Info_002
data.value: I can also brew specialty tea with special effects!

data.name: Tea_Intro_1
data.value: Come on in, this is [color=#98C379]Polteageist Brew[color].

data.name: Tea_Intro_2
data.value: Teeaaaa!!

data.name: Tea_Intro_Return
data.value: Alright, anythin' else?

data.name: Tea_Option_Order
data.value: Order

data.name: Tea_Option_Specialties
data.value: Specialties

data.name: Tea_Order_Begin
data.value: Comin' right up!

data.name: Tea_Order_Drink
data.value: {0} drank the tea.

data.name: Tea_Order_Result_None
data.value: {0} felt happy!

data.name: Tea_Order_What
data.value: What do you want in it? (You can select multiple items with {0})

data.name: Tea_Order_Who
data.value: Who am I makin' this for?
